item.title: Explosions Heard in Ukraine’s Capital
item.description: A countrywide alert warned of incoming ballistic missiles.

item.title: Canada Prepares for Trump Tariff Threat With Three-Stage Plan
item.description: Canadian officials are preparing retaliatory measures if the new U.S. administration imposes tariffs on Canadian imports.
